portfolio.title: BinIt!
portfolio.description: An application that uses AI to sort trash based on images uploaded by the user, with the ability to differentiate between waste, recycling, compost, and paper. Created in 8 hours during Root Hacks 2023, and winner of "WiCS Award - best project with at least one women-identifying or non-binary student on their team"

portfolio.title: Pawhub
portfolio.description: An application for pet owners to use as a central resource for making new friends, and to discuss everything pet related.
portfolio.stack: React, Ruby on Rails, Node.js, Axios, PostgreSQL, Bootstrap, and more!

portfolio.title: Interview Scheduler
portfolio.description: An application for students to create, edit and delete interview appointments with mentors.
portfolio.stack: React, Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, Storybook, SASS, Jest, Webpack, Cypress, and more!

portfolio.title: dead.Stock
portfolio.description: A buy/sell application for users to browse and list sneakers for sale.
portfolio.stack: JavaScript, Node.js, Express, jQuery, PostgreSQL, SASS, and more!

portfolio.title: Tweeter
portfolio.description: A Twitter clone. Post and see them update in real-time.
portfolio.stack: JavaScript, Node.js, Express, jQuery, AJAX, HTML, CSS, and more!

portfolio.title: Tinyapp
portfolio.description: A TinyURL clone - create, edit, or delete shortened URLs that anybody can use.
portfolio.stack: JavaScript, Node.js, Express, EJS, Mocha/Chai, and more!
